requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
